error.Message: An error occurred while processing your request. Please contact an administrator.
Username and/or shared key are incorrect.
error.Description: Thrown when the authentication header was not presented or was invalid.

error.Message: The requested term Id TermId has expired.
error.Description: Thrown when an expired Term Id has been requested.

error.Message: Insufficient request parameters: OfferId and TermsId are mandatory.
error.Description: Thrown when the query is invalid. E.g., Offer ID was missing.

error.Message: Term Id TermId is invalid.
error.Description: Thrown when the requested Term Id parameter has an invalid value. E.g., invalid format is specified in the request or the Term Id requested could not be found.

error.Message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later or contact administrator.
error.Description: Thrown when the offer Service is turned off by an administrator.

error.Message: Offer Id OfferId is not active in the offer service.
error.Description: Thrown when the requested Offer Id has been deactivated or suspended in the Offer Service.

error.Message: Offer Id OfferId is invalid.
error.Description: Thrown when the requested Offer Id parameter has an invalid value. E.g., invalid format is specified in the request or the Offer Id requested could not be found.

error.Message: Username and/or shared key are incorrect.
error.Description: Thrown when the authentication header was not presented or was invalid.

error.Message: Provider Id ApiUser is not authorized to perform this operation.
error.Description: Thrown when a provider requesting a call to Offer Service API's doesn’t have ‘OfferServiceUser’ resource defined in PMP Auth.

error.Message: Provider Id ApiUser was not found. Please try again later or contact administrator.
error.Description: Thrown when the provider is not found in the call to the service.

error.Message: Provider Id ApiUser does not have the required permissions to call this service. Please try again later or contact administrator.
error.Description: Thrown when the provider is deactivated in the showMainstreamProvider call.

error.Message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later or contact administrator.
error.Description: Thrown when the offer Service is turned off by an administrator.

error.Message: Unexpected error encountered while trying to get respondent details.
error.Description: Thrown when Offer Service fails to reach LiveMatch or RepondentCatalog while processing provider request.

error.Message: Insufficient request parameters: COREcontact_country and CORElanguage parameters are mandatory when requesting offers for a specific pid.
error.Description: Thrown when the query is invalid. E.g., COREcontact_country was missing.

error.Message: Offer Id OfferId is either not active or invalid.
error.Description: Thrown when the requested Offer Id parameter has an invalid value. E.g., invalid format is specified in the request or the Offer Id requested could not be found.

error.Message: Attribute Id AttributeId is invalid.
error.Description: Thrown when the requested Attribute Id parameter has an invalid value. E.g., invalid format is specified in the request or the Attribute Id requested could not be found.

error.Message: Sample Id: SampleId will be suspended.
There are currently no active offers in the offer service. Please try again later.
Offer service could not connect to SAM for unknown reasons.
There are currently no active offers matching the sent attributes. Please try again later.
No Document was found in Steam Service for the offer with sample SampleId.
The study StudyId or the sample SampleId are not valid for the Fetch Multi Service.
The Study for sample SampleId is not valid for the GMI GetSample Service.
Unexpected error encountered while trying to get Quota Expressions details.
error.Description: Thrown when Offer Service fails to get the Quota Expressions for this offer.

error.Message: Insufficient request parameters: Offer Id is mandatory.
error.Description: Thrown when the query is invalid. E.g., Offer ID was missing.

error.Message: Missing action in the request.
error.Description: Thrown when the action has not been specified. E.g., Liveoffers/OfferId/Attributes.

error.Message: There are currently no attributes in the offer service. Please try again later.
Offer Id OfferId has no published attributes
Missing or invalid method.
Invalid Study Id StudyId.
There are currently no offers in the Offer Service.
The Sample SampleId was not found on SAM.
The Study StudyId was not found on SAM.
Invalid values passed.
Offer Service failed to connect to GetOpenSampleAttributes service. Please try again later or contact administrator.
Offer Service failed to connect to GetMainstreamStudySamples service. Please try again later or contact administrator.
Offer Service failed to connect to Steam service. Please try again later or contact administrator.
The QuotaCells for Sample SampleId were not found.
The Sample SampleId was not found in Offer Service.
Missing data. Required parameters: Sample Id, Study Id, Title and CPI.
The Sample SampleId was not found in the Study StudyId sample list.
Missing data. Required parameters: Sample Id.
Unable to publish the default cpi table.
Missing data. Required parameters: Sample Id.
Unable to get the default cpi.
No history was found for this Sample Id SampleId.
Invalid Sample Id SampleId.
Provider ProviderId not found in the Offer Service.
Unable to set the default cpi.
Unable to get the default cpi table.
User ApiUser is not authorized to perform this operation.
Unable to publish default CPI table. No values passed.
Unexpected error encountered while trying to authorize the OfferService. Please contact an administrator.
error.Description: The Offer Service api user is not authorized to access SAM

error.Message: Unexpected error encountered while trying to authorize the OfferService. Please contact an administrator.
error.Description: The Offer Service api user is not authorized to access LiveMatchHistory

error.Message: Unexpected error encountered while trying to authorize the OfferService. Please contact an administrator.
error.Description: The Offer Service api user is not authorized to access LiveMatch

error.Message: Unexpected error encountered while trying to authorize the OfferService. Please contact an administrator.
error.Description: The Offer Service api user is not authorized to access showMainstreamProviders

error.Message: The sample does not have a term history.
error.Description: The sample does not have any term.

error.Message: The sample information is outdated.
error.Description: When the request is sent a check on Offer Service is done to check if any changes occurred since that request.

error.Message: Missing data. Required parameters: User Id, Sample Id, Cpi, UpdateDate.
error.Description: SetNewCpi function check for the required parameters fail.

error.Message: Missing data. Required parameters: Sample, LOI, IR.
error.Description: Getting the samples' default CPI failed due to missing data.

error.Message: Malformed string sequest. The request should be a sequence of 'SampleId/LOI/IR' separated by '-'
error.Description: The string sequence is invalid

error.Message: Missing parameters: Offer Id, Reference Id.
error.Description: The service requires both parameters to exist. Offer Id should be a Guid and ReferenceId should be a string.

error.Message: No Elements found for Offer Id OfferId, Reference Id ReferenceId.
error.Description: The call to Get the Reference Details was successful but did not return any Element.

error.Message: Offer Service failed to update the sample OfferServiceInd value on SAM.
The study StudyId is not valid for the Steam Quota Service.
The Simplified Quota Expression for the Offer Id OfferId is currently not available. Please try again later.
error.Description: Thrown when the requested Offer Id does not have the simplified quota expression filled. E.g., not supported attributes passed to the simplify webservice when initializing the simplified quota expression.
